titleStmt.title: Hymns compos'd for the celebration of the holy ordinance of baptism By Joseph Stennett.
titleStmt.author: Stennett, Joseph, 1663-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Marshall, at the Bible in Grace-church-street,

notesStmt.note: A re-issue of pages from the first edition, dated 1712, with an added undated title page for the second edition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
